autofocus.description: Whether the drawer switches focus to its DOM node when expanded
autofocus.description_zh: 抽屉展开后是否将焦点切换至其 Dom 节点

:bodyStyle.description: Lets you style the content portion of the drawer
:bodyStyle.description_zh: 可用于设置 Drawer 内容部分的样式

class.description: Drawer container outer className setting, if you need to set the outermost layer, use rootClassName
class.description_zh: Drawer 容器外层 className 设置，如果需要设置最外层，请使用 rootClassName

closable.description: Whether to display the close button in the upper left corner
closable.description_zh: 是否显示左上角的关闭按钮

:contentWrapperStyle.description: Lets you style the content portion of the Drawer wrap
:contentWrapperStyle.description_zh: 可用于设置 Drawer 包裹内容部分的样式

destroyOnClose.description: Destroys the child elements in the Drawer when closed
destroyOnClose.description_zh: 关闭时销毁 Drawer 里的子元素

:extra.description: The operating area in the upper right corner of the drawer
:extra.description_zh: 抽屉右上角的操作区域

:footerStyle.description: The style of the drawer footer widget

:forceRender.description_zh: 预渲染 Drawer 内元素

:getContainer.description: Specify the node on which the drawer is mounted, and display it in the container `() => HTMLElement` | Selectors
:getContainer.description_zh: 指定 Drawer 挂载的节点，**并在容器内展现** | `() => HTMLElement` | Selectors

:headerStyle.description: Lets you style the Drawer head
:headerStyle.description_zh: 用于设置 Drawer 头部的样式

height.description: Height, used when 'placement' is 'top' or bottom
height.description_zh: 高度, 在 `placement` 为 `top` 或 bottom 时使用

keyboard.description: Whether the keyboard ESC is supported
keyboard.description_zh: 是否支持键盘 esc 关闭

mask.description: Whether or not to display a mask

maskClosable.description: Click whether the mask is allowed to be turned off
maskClosable.description_zh: 点击蒙层是否允许关闭

:push.description: Used to set the push behavior of a multi-layer drawer
:push.description_zh: 用于设置多层 Drawer 的推动行为

rootClassName.description: The class name of the outer container of the dialog box
rootClassName.description_zh: 对话框外层容器的类名

:rootStyle.description: It can be used to style the outermost container of the drawer, except that the effect node includes a mask
:rootStyle.description_zh: 可用于设置 Drawer 最外层容器的样式，和 `style` 的区别是作用节点包括 mask

size.description: Preset drawer width (or height), default '378px' and large 736px
size.description_zh: 预设抽屉宽度（或高度），default `378px` 和 large 736px

:style.description: Style the Drawer container, and if you only need to set the content part, use bodyStyle
:style.description_zh: 设计 Drawer 容器样式，如果你只需要设置内容部分请使用 bodyStyle

events.name: afterOpenChange
events.description: The callback after the animation ends when the drawer is switched
events.description_zh: 切换抽屉时动画结束后的回调

events.name: close
events.description: Click the callback of the mask layer or the top left corner cross or cancel button
events.description_zh: 点击遮罩层或左上角叉或取消按钮的回调
